report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Emotet started as a banking trojan in 2014 and later evolved to what has been considered the worlds most dangerous malware by Europol, often used throughout the world to deliver many different threats, including TrickBot.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: In October 2020, Netskope analyzed an Emotet campaign that was using PowerShell and WMI within malicious Office documents to deliver its payload. Later in 2021, we also spotted new delivery mechanisms being used, including squiblytwo. However, the most popular delivery mechanism used by Emotet to date is the malicious Microsoft Office document.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: In January 2022, as an attempt to mitigate attacks via malicious Office documents, Microsoft announced that VBA macros will be blocked by default in files downloaded from the internet, which directly affected the way Emotet was being delivered. Netskope released a detailed blog post about this protection, anticipating that we would see the use of other types of files, like LNK and VBS.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: On April 26, 2022, a new Emotet campaign was spotted in the wild, where the usual Office delivery system was replaced with LNK files, in a clear response to the VBA protection launched by Microsoft. Netskope Threat Labs found 139 distinct LNK files that are part of the same campaign, delivering two distinct payloads that share the same C2 infrastructure.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: In this blog post, we will analyze this Emotet campaign, from the new delivery mechanism to the last payload.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Usually, the initial stage of Emotet is a malicious Office document that abuses VBA macros to download and execute the payload. In this new delivery system, Emotet abuses the LNK file format (a.k.a. MS-SHLLINK and Shortcut) to execute a PowerShell script.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Looking at the files properties, we can see that the LNK target is pointing to the PowerShell executable.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Using the LNK parser tool, its possible to extract more details, such as the command executed by PowerShell. The command here decodes a large base64 string and saves the output to a file in the users temporary folder. This file is the main script, which is deleted after its executed.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Emotets PowerShell script, executed through the LNK file.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: The decoded script contains a list of URLs where Emotets payload is hosted. Once running, it iterates over the list and makes a request using PowerShells Invoke-WebRequest function. If the binary is successfully downloaded, it saves the file to Windows temporary directory and executes it using regsvr32.exe.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Main PowerShell script executed by Emotets LNK file.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: We found 139 distinct LNK files related to Emotet, sharing three different scripts, where the only differences were the payload URLs. All the hashes can be found in our GitHub repository.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Similarities between the analyzed LNK files.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: From the 139 LNK files we analyzed, we found 12 distinct URLs. Only 9 URLs were online at the time of the analysis, delivering 2 distinct payloads.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: These payloads are packed Emotet samples, both 64-bit DLLs with different compilation timestamps. The first one was likely built on April 25, 2022, and the second on April 27, 2022.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Comparison between the two downloaded payloads.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Emotets main payload is encrypted and stored in the resources of both packed samples, which despite some differences, are using the same technique to decrypt and load Emotet.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Once running, the packer allocates and executes a shellcode, responsible for the payload decryption process.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Then, it loads the resource data and decrypts it using a simple rolling XOR algorithm with a small string as the key, revealing Emotets payload.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: We created a Python script that can be used to statically decrypt and extract Emotets payload from the loader/packed sample.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Python script used to unpack Emotet.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: As previously mentioned, both files unpack Emotet using the same process. The only difference is the decryption key.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Decryption key used in the second payload.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: In the third stage, we have two 64-bit Emotet DLLs that were extracted from the two loaders/packed samples. They share many similarities, such as the real DLL name, the compiler, and some C2 server addresses. The first one was likely compiled on April 19, 2022, and the second one on April 26, 2022.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Comparison between the two Emotet payloads.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: The real name for both files is Y.dll.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: For persistence, Emotet creates a Windows service to execute itself via regsvr32.exe.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: All the important strings used by Emotet are encrypted, located in the PE .text section.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: To decrypt the string, this sample uses the same algorithm that is found in 32-bit samples. The first four bytes are the decryption key, followed by the length and the encrypted string.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: All the decrypted strings can be found in our GitHub repository. For the C2 addresses, Emotet uses the same logic, but the data is located in the PE .data section.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: We found 63 IP addresses in each binary we analyzed. To extract this information statically, we used a Python script that parses the file and implements the same decryption logic.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Python script to extract Emotets C2 addresses.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Emotet has already proven to be extremely resilient, as even after a global collaboration among law enforcement agencies in January 2021 disrupted the malwares infrastructure, the botnet managed to return to its activities in late 2021. Replacing the delivery mechanism from malicious Office documents with another file format shows that the attackers are constantly adapting Emotet to remain active.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Netskope Threat Labs is actively monitoring this campaign and has ensured coverage for all known threat indicators and payloads.

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: Netskope Threat ProtectionShortcut.Trojan.GenAutorunLnkFileWin64.Trojan.Emotet Shortcut.Trojan.GenAutorunLnkFile Win64.Trojan.Emotet Netskope Advanced Threat Protection provides proactive coverage against this threat.Gen.Malware.Detect.By.StHeur indicates a sample that was detected using static analysisGen.Malware.Detect.By.Sandbox indicates a sample that was detected by our cloud sandbox Gen.Malware.Detect.By.StHeur indicates a sample that was detected using static analysis Gen.Malware.Detect.By.Sandbox indicates a sample that was detected by our cloud sandbox

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection

report_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
chapter_title: Emotet: New Delivery Mechanism to Bypass VBA Protection
text: All the IOCs related to this campaign, the scripts, and the Yara rules can be found in our GitHub repository.
